info.title: Axway-APIM-ELK Setup-API
info.description: This API can optionally be called to call the setup of the Elasticsearch solution manually. The API calls a flow, which is also started automatically with a defined interval. The main purpose of the endpoint as of now is to test the flow implementation/logic.

post.description: Triggers the setup for the given index.

parameters.name: indexName
parameters.description: The name of the index to be configured in ES
